discription: About Us  ZeMoSo Technologies provides product & data engineering solutions using open source Big Data stacks, Machine Learning and advanced custom visualizations. Last year we were featured as one of Deloitte Fastest 50 growing tech companies from India. Our founders have had past successes - founded a decision management company acquired by SAP AG (now part of Hana Big data stack &Netweaver; BPM), early engineering team of Zoho (leading billion $ SaaS player) & some Private Equity experience. Marquee customers along with some exciting startups are part of our clientele.  We have started our Dallas office recently and now want to expand. Currently, for our Hyderabad, India development centre, we are looking for serve side engineers with good exposure to Big Data and Machine Learning. Location: Hyderabad  Qualification: BTECH/BE in CSE or equivalent  Skills Required:  Server side developers with exposure to Data Platforms (Cassandra, Spark, Kafka) and good server side development experience in Java AND/OR Python, etc. Exposure to Machine Learning (Tensorflow) will be a plus Good to great problem solving and communication skill Ability to deliver in an extremely fast paced development environment Ability to handle ambiguity Should be a good team player  Job Responsibilities:  Learn the technology area where you are going to work Develop bug free, unit tested and well documented code as per requirements Stringently adhere to delivery timelines Provide mentoring support to Software Engineer AND/ OR Associate Software Engineers Any other as specified by the reporting authority

discription:
Data Engineer will work on collecting, storing, processing, and analyzing huge sets of data. The primary focus will be on choosing optimal solutions to use for these purposes, then maintaining, implementing, and monitoring them. You will also be responsible for integrating them with the architecture used across the company in various products. 

Skillset : 

1. Proficient understanding of distributed computing principles 

2. Ability to build, run and manage large clusters 

3. Hadoop v2, MapReduce, HDFS 

4. Java, Python 

5. Large Scale crawling : Scrapy, Nutch and custom crawling solutions 

6. Experience with Apache Solr Lucene

discription: Short DescriptionAWS Redshift Engineer - 6 to 9 Years - Mumbau (Airoli)QualificationsJob ResponsibilitiesJob Title: AWS Redshift EngineerExperience:- 6+ yearsJob Location: Mumbai - Airoli Expected Role:The role is for strong AWS Redshift engineer with working experience on Redshift schema design, performance optimization, capacity planning, performance tuning with large data sets.The candidate should be familiar with AWS console and services like RDS, S3 etc. Candidate should have strong ETL and SQL skills.The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 2 years commercial and hands-on development experience on AWS Redshift.The ideal candidate will have enthusiasm for learning and working closely with the rest of development team which is located in Mumbai and US (BA’s, Technical Architects). The candidate should be flexible enough to work on both small scale enhancements and must also have the ability to undertake larger complicated projects with other developers. The candidate should have experience of working with onsite offshore model.Key Responsibilities:• Should have knowledge on when, why and how to use Redshift in a distributed environment• Design and implement schema and database tables with performance optimization, capacity planning, performance tuning• Use industry best practices to build efficient schema and data models• Build efficient and long term storage infrastructure• Use adequate AWS database/storage services as per business need• Build quick proof of concepts using AWS redshift and other AWS services• Provide estimates for work• Provide updates of status and estimates to complete• Identify risks and issues, and help monitor themSuccessful candidate is expected to perform the above tasks in collaboration and agreement with the team leaders, project leads and other development staff.Mandatory Technical Skills:• Solid exposure to traditional Data Warehousing and experience on MPP data store Amazon Redshift• Should be proficient in database concepts - rdbms nosql, Advanced SQL (PostgreSQL), data analytics and data structures• Should be proficient in data modeling, data integration• Should be familiar with AWS console, cli, sdk• Should be comfortable with Redshift concepts like DISTKEY, SORTKEY etc.• Performance tuning and optimization for Amazon Redshift• Should have strong working knowledge on RDS, DynamoDB and S3• Should have strong ETL skills• Experience on Databases, Data Warehouses, Reporting, Analytics• Ability to write SQL scripts and complex queries.• Should have ability to understand existing data landscape and propose efficient design• Experience with metadata management• Excellent understanding of data warehouse architecture and design principles and their application• Monitored and Improved AWS Redshift Cluster Performance.• User and Access management of Redshift Cluster.• Strong scripting experience in Python.Nice to Have Technical Skills:• Familiarity with big data technologies like Hadoop, Spark, Hive/Pig, etc.• Experience in Scala and Java• Past experience in Informatica or other ETL tools• Exposure to BI tools like Quicksight, Tableau/Qlik• Experience working with RESTful interfaces• Good knowledge of Iaas, Paas cloud services• Keen to adopt devops and Agile culture• Good knowledge on Cloud and AWS featuresQualifications:• B.E / B. tech or equivalentPreferred Certifications:• AWS Cloud Certifications• Database Certifications Contact Person - Pratiksha Sonavane

discription:
Software Quality Engineer
Service Management Hyderabad , India

Description

ServiceNow is changing the way people work. With a service-orientation toward the activities, tasks and processes that make up day-to-day work life, we help the modern enterprise operate faster and be more scalable than ever before.
We're disruptive. We work hard but try not to take ourselves too seriously. We are highly adaptable and constantly evolving. We are passionate about our product, and we live for our customers. We have high expectations and a career at ServiceNow means challenging you to always be better.
What you get to do in this role:
As a Softw are QA Engineer , you will be a key member of the Service Management team driving the quality of our products and services to the next level. You will work within our agile software development process and have an important impact on the Service Management team. This is a developer role in Quality Engineering Department.

In order to be successful in this role, we need someone who has:
4+ years of experience in Java programming with Selenium, JUnit and TestNG .5+ years professional experience in quality assurance or /and software application development.Recent experience with scripting in Javascript, Shell, Perl, or Python .Hands-on experience with Eclipse, Jenkin, Maven, and Git .Experience in SAAS testing for Features, Security, Upgrade, Performance, and Scalability .Experience with code coverage tools such as Jacoco and SonarQube is a plus .Experience with Appium is a plus.Ability to design, create and implement automated test cases for new requirements in complex systems quickly.Experience with agile software development process.Passionate about quality.Good communication and people skills and have good attitude.Self-starter, team player, and self-motivated.Desire to seek continuous improvement in the quality assurance processes to drive better quality and efficiency.BS in Computer Science
We provide competitive compensation, generous benefits and a professional atmosphere. This is a very collaborative and inclusive work environment where individuals strong on aptitude and attitude will have an opportunity to grow their professional careers through working with some of the most advanced technology and talented developers in the business.
